      • setMobileKey

        public LDConfig.Builder setMobileKey(java.lang.String mobileKey)
        Sets the key for authenticating with LaunchDarkly. This is required unless you're using the client in offline mode.
        Parameters:
        mobileKey - Get this from the LaunchDarkly web app under Team Settings.
        Returns:

      • setBaseUri

        public LDConfig.Builder setBaseUri(android.net.Uri baseUri)
        Set the base uri for connecting to LaunchDarkly. You probably don't need to set this unless instructed by LaunchDarkly.
        Parameters:
        baseUri -
        Returns:

      • setEventsUri

        Parameters:
        eventsUri -
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        streamUri -
        Returns:

      • setStream

        public LDConfig.Builder setStream(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables real-time streaming flag updates. Default: true. When set to false, an efficient caching polling mechanism is used.
        Parameters:
        enabled -
        Returns:

      • setPollingIntervalMillis

        public LDConfig.Builder setPollingIntervalMillis(int pollingIntervalMillis)
        Only relevant when setStream(false) is called. Sets the interval between feature flag updates. Default: LDConfig.DEFAULT_POLLING_INTERVAL_MILLIS Minimum value: LDConfig.MIN_POLLING_INTERVAL_MILLIS. When set, this will also set the eventsFlushIntervalMillis to the same value.
        Parameters:
        pollingIntervalMillis -
        Returns:

      • setBackgroundPollingIntervalMillis

        public LDConfig.Builder setBackgroundPollingIntervalMillis(int backgroundPollingIntervalMillis)
        Sets the interval in milliseconds that twe will poll for flag updates when your app is in the background. Default: LDConfig.DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_POLLING_INTERVAL_MILLIS
        Parameters:
        backgroundPollingIntervalMillis -

      • setDisableBackgroundUpdating

        public LDConfig.Builder setDisableBackgroundUpdating(boolean disableBackgroundUpdating)
        Disables feature flag updates when your app is in the background. Default: false
        Parameters:
        disableBackgroundUpdating -

      • setOffline

        public LDConfig.Builder setOffline(boolean offline)
        Disables all network calls from the LaunchDarkly Client. Once the client has been created, use the LDClient.setOffline() method to disable network calls. Default: false
        Parameters:
        offline -
        Returns:
